mapper.select: select m.menu_code from t_wms_menu m left join t_wms_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id=m.id and rm.del_flag ='1' where m.del_flag ='1' and m.type =2 and rm.role_id = #{roleId};
select m.menu_code, m.url from t_wms_menu m left join t_wms_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id=m.id and rm.del_flag ='1' where m.del_flag ='1' and m.type =2 and rm.role_id = #{roleId};
